summary:
This is the suit of armor that Ezio wears during the events depicted in Revelations.
Currently, it replaces the Dark Brotherhood robe. This is basically a request for help in making it standalone, since I suck at modding this game.
descriptionHtml:
This is the suit of armor that Ezio wears during the events depicted in Revelations. It was created by LordOfWar, and I\'m simply adding it here and trying to make it standalone.
Currently, it replaces the Dark Brotherhood robe. I would like to make this armor NOT replace anything, so I tried to work on it in Skyrim Mod Tool, but failed miserably.
This is basically a request for help in making it standalone, since I suck at modding this game. If ANYONE would like to help, I\'d be more than happy. Please contact me via message if you are interested.

Still, there are several problems with this mod.
-legs are invisible when using any pants except for the matching shoes, and when not using    pants at all
-when running and jumping, the robe streches below the character\'s arms

Again, if anyone is willing to help me with this, I would be very grateful.
author: LordOfWar
